content.description: The next questions refer to the maps below.
content.question: Which of the following factors contributed most to the process shown on the maps?

choices.label: The failure of Poland to industrialize as rapidly as its neighbors
The ability of the Polish nobility to limit the growth of royal power
The early adoption of French Revolutionary ideals by the Polish middle class
The reimposition of serfdom on the Polish peasantry

content.answer: The ability of the Polish nobility to limit the growth of royal power

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
